IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The Avery Coonley School elevates high-achieving and gifted learners through immersion in a mutually talented community where intellect, curiosity, and creativity are enhanced by optimal challenge.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: Chief Financial Officer/Asst Head of School

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The school will use the funds for various school related purposes.

BASED ON THE EVALUATION OF THE SCHOOL'S TAX POSITIONS, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES ALL POSITIONS WOULD BE UPHELD UNDER AN EXAMINATION; THEREFORE, NO PROVISION FOR THE TAX EFFECTS OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS HAS BEEN RECORDED FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2022.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: Scholarships and covid relief based on financial need

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization keeps files containing parent applications, financial statements, tax returns, sss forms, correspondence, etc.
$31,800 housing allowance to headmaster is included in his reportable compensation.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Board reviews the form 990 prior to its filing.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization requires an annual assessment of any potential conflicts of interest.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The process for determining compensation requires review by the Board and the use of comparable data, as well as contemporaneous substantiation of the deliberation and decision.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy and financial statements available to the public upon request.
The process has not changed from the prior year.
